CustomField.formula: CASE( TEXT( StageName ) , 'Stage 0 - Idea', GATE_1_Date__c , 'Stage 1 - Feasibility', GATE_2_Date__c, 'Stage 2 - Business Case', GATE_3_Date__c, 'Stage 3 - Development', GATE_4_Date__c, 'Stage 4 - Scale Up', GATE_5_Date__c, Target_Launch__c)
CustomField.label: Next Gate Review Date
